articles.author: Nathan Vass in New York
articles.title: New report rejects China's claim virus came from Wuhan market - Coffs Coast Advocate
articles.description: American academics have poured cold water on the theory COVID-19 originated in a wet market, stoking claims it came from a laboratory.
articles.content:
An explosive new scientific study has challenged China's claim that the coronavirus originated in a wet market in Wuhan.
The study by university academics in the US and Canada found the coronavirus was in fact taken to the live animal market in Wuhan by some… [+10055 chars]

articles.title: Coronavirus misinformation and confusion plagues health workers - ABC News
articles.description: Healthcare workers are dealing with a global contagion of misinformation and confusion about COVID-19 as well as the pandemic itself.
articles.content:

To make it worse, the information claimed to be from an infectious disease expert when it wasn't.
